title: Repo the Genetic Opera
description: A worldwide epidemic encourages a biotech company to launch an organ-financing program similar in nature to a standard car loan. The repossession clause is a killer, however.
actors: Paul Sorvino, Anthony Head, Alexa PenaVega, Paris Hilton

hookQuestions.questionText: Wanna see Paris Hilton's face fall off on stage?
Did you know that organs can be repossed?
Have you ever seen a slasher musical?

title: Flight of the Navigator
description: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.
writer: Mark H. Baker, Michael Burton, Phil Joanou
actors: Joey Cramer, Paul Reubens, Cliff De Young

hookQuestions.questionText: Ever seen a chrome floating football?

title: The Last Dragon
description: In New York City, a young man searches for a Master to obtain the final level of martial arts mastery known as the Glow.

hookQuestions.questionText: Whose the baddest MOFO in Harlem?!

title: The Wiz
description: An adaptation of "The Wizard of Oz" that tries to capture the essence of the African-American experience.
writer: L. Frank Baum, William F. Brown, Joel Schumacher
actors: Diana Ross, Michael Jackson, Nipsey Russell

hookQuestions.questionText: Did you know that the ruby slippers are actually supposed to be silver?
Wanna see Michael Jackson's real nose?

title: Le Violon Rouge
description: A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.
actors: Carlo Cecchi, Jean-Luc Bideau, Christoph Koncz, Samuel L. Jackson

hookQuestions.questionText: Did you know that Samuel Jackson is in a film where he dosen't cuss?

title: One Hour Photo
description: A mentally unstable photo developer targets a middle-class family after his obsession with them becomes more sick and disturbing than any of them could imagine.
actors: Robin Williams, Connie Nielsen, Michael Vartan

hookQuestions.questionText: Wanna see Robin Williams's eyes bleed?
Ever wondered what that retail employee is thinking?
